statements: SELECT * FROM auction_platform WHERE auction_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, current_bid FROM auction_platform WHERE opening_bid > 500;
SELECT artist_name, current_bid, bidder_name FROM auction_platform WHERE auction_status = 'Active';
SELECT artwork_title, current_bid, bid_timestamp FROM auction_platform ORDER BY current_bid DESC;
SELECT bidder_name, bid_timestamp, payment_status FROM auction_platform WHERE auction_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM auction_platform WHERE auction_id = 1
SELECT artwork_title, artist_name, opening_bid FROM auction_platform WHERE current_bid > 500
SELECT artist_name, current_bid, bid_timestamp FROM auction_platform WHERE auction_status = 'active' ORDER BY bid_timestamp DESC
SELECT bidder_name, opening_bid, current_bid, auction_status FROM auction_platform WHERE payment_status = 'paid' AND current_bid < 1000 ORDER BY current_bid ASC
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM auction_platform WHERE artwork_title LIKE '%flower%'
SELECT * FROM bidding_information;
SELECT bid_id, bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information WHERE bid_amount > 1000;
SELECT auction_id, start_time, end_time FROM auction_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information WHERE bidder_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM bidding_information WHERE bidder_name = 'Alice';
SELECT bid_id, bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information WHERE bid_amount > 10000 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT auction_id, status FROM auction_status WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY auction_id ASC;
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information WHERE bid_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY bidder_name ASC, bid_amount DESC;

SELECT * FROM bidding_information JOIN auction_status ON bidding_information.auction_id = auction_status.auction_id WHERE auction_status.status = 'closed' ORDER BY bidding_information.bid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM bidding_information;
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount, bid_timestamp FROM bidding_information WHERE bid_amount > 1000;
SELECT bid_id, bidder_name, bid_amount, bid_timestamp FROM bidding_information ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM auction_status WHERE current_bid IS NOT NULL;
SELECT auction_name, auction_end, highest_bidder FROM auction_status WHERE auction_start < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bidding_information WHERE bidder_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM auction_status WHERE auction_end > NOW();
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_information ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT auction_name, current_bid FROM auction_status WHERE current_bid IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, item_name, bid_amount FROM Bidding_info WHERE bidder_id = 101
SELECT * FROM Auction_status WHERE id = 5
SELECT item_name, bid_amount, bid_timestamp FROM Bidding_info ORDER BY bid_timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email FROM User_info WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT auction_id, highest_bid FROM Auction_status WHERE auction_end_time > NOW()
SELECT id, item_name, bid_amount FROM Bidding_info WHERE bidder_id = 100 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Auction_status WHERE auction_end_time > '2023-01-31' AND highest_bid > 500 ORDER BY auction_start_time ASC;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM User_info WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT b.id, b.item_name, p.payment_amount FROM Bidding_info b INNER JOIN Payment_processing p ON b.bidder_id = p.bidder_id WHERE p.payment_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY b.id;

SELECT u.username, b.item_name, a.highest_bid FROM User_info u LEFT JOIN Bidding_info b ON u.id = b.bidder_id LEFT JOIN Auction_status a ON b.id = a.auction_id WHERE b.bid_amount > a.highest_bid ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArtworkInformation;
SELECT title, starting_price FROM ArtworkInformation WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM PaymentProcessing;
SELECT username, email, address FROM ParticipantInformation WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT id, status, start_date, end_date FROM AuctionStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM BiddingInformation WHERE bid_amount > 500 ORDER BY bid_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT artist_id, title, description FROM ArtworkInformation WHERE starting_price >= 1000 ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_id, username, email, address FROM ParticipantInformation WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM AuctionStatus WHERE status = 'active' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, bidder_id, artwork_id, bid_amount, bid_timestamp FROM BiddingInformation WHERE bid_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
